name: Pengu (HorizonZz)
description:
PENGU

Pengu is a 2D platformer game, where the player has just one objective: Get as high as possible, as fast as possible! Pengu also features a leaderboard system, so you can share your high score, and see how it stacks up to others...

How to Play?

Jump on platforms to bounce Pengu higher and higher.

Platform Types:

  • Purple Platforms: Bounce Pengu
  • Blue Platforms: Bounce Pengu & oscillate side to side
  • Green Platforms: Bounce Pengu much higher than normal
  • Red Platforms: Bounce Pengu & then disappear

Controls:

  • Move Left: 'A' or 'Left Arrow'
  • Move Right: 'D' or 'Right Arrow'
Credits

All Art and Code by HorizonZz.

Reference for background from @jodeng.

Music by @AudioCoffee, @Pixabay & @ZapSplat.
